hero.subtitle: Authentic Taco Catering · Los Angeles · 20+ Years

about.label: Our Story
about.heading: The Taste of
about.p1: For over two decades, México Lindo Y Que Rico has been bringing the authentic flavors of Mexico to celebrations across the greater Los Angeles area.
about.p2: Everything is prepared fresh on-site with recipes passed down through generations — from perfectly marinated al pastor to our handmade tortillas. We don't just cater, we create an experience.
about.p3: From intimate backyard gatherings to grand celebrations of 200+ guests, we handle everything — setup, service, and cleanup — so you can enjoy every moment.

menu.label: Your Selection
menu.heading: Choose Four
menu.description: Each protein is prepared fresh on-site with authentic recipes. Pick four to make your event unforgettable.

asada.name: Asada
asada.description: Grilled marinated beef, charred to perfection with a smoky, savory depth

pastor.name: Pastor
pastor.description: Slow-roasted pork with pineapple, achiote, and dried chilies

chicken.name: Chicken
chicken.description: Tender, seasoned chicken grilled and hand-pulled for the perfect taco

chorizo.name: Chorizo
chorizo.description: Spiced Mexican sausage, crumbled and crisped with bold, smoky flavor

fish.name: Fish Fillet
fish.description: Lightly seasoned white fish, grilled until golden and flaky

shrimp.name: Shrimp Fajitas
shrimp.description: Sautéed shrimp with peppers and onions in a zesty citrus marinade

veggies.name: Veggies
veggies.description: Grilled seasonal vegetables with Mexican herbs and a touch of lime

alambres.name: Alambres
alambres.description: Chopped beef with bacon, peppers, onions, and melted cheese

packages.label: Transparent Pricing
packages.heading: Catering Packages
packages.description: Simple pricing for every celebration. Every package includes four meats of your choice and all the essentials.
packages.moreTimeText: Add an extra hour for just
packages.moreTimeNote: We arrive 1 hour early for setup — this does not count toward your service time.

extras.label: Add-Ons
extras.heading: Extras
extras.description: Complement your taco spread. Each item serves 40–50 people unless noted otherwise.

items.aguaNote: Horchata, Jamaica, Lemon, Pineapple, Tamarindo, Melon

gallery.label: Our Work
gallery.heading: Gallery
gallery.description: A glimpse of what we bring to your celebration.

contact.label: Get In Touch
contact.heading: Ready for the
contact.description: Whether it's a birthday, wedding, corporate event, or backyard party — we'll make it one to remember.

footer.description: Authentic taco catering for the greater Los Angeles area. Over 20 years of bringing the flavors of México to your celebrations.
footer.copyright: © {year} México Lindo Y Que Rico. All rights reserved.

booking.title: Book Your Event
booking.subtitle: Our online booking system is coming soon. In the meantime, give us a call to reserve your date.
booking.comingSoonDescription: We're building a seamless booking experience. Select your date, package, meats, extras, and pay — all in one place.

home.title: México Lindo Y Que Rico | Taco Catering in Los Angeles
home.description: Authentic taco catering for your next event. Serving the greater Los Angeles area for over 20 years. Aquí la panza es primero.
